articles.title: Share price of Tata Power jumps as Sensex drops 658.6 points - Economic Times
articles.description: Promoters held 46.86 per cent stake in the company as of 31-Dec-2021, while FII and DII ownership stood at 10.84 per cent and 4.48 per cent, respectively.
articles.content: The share price of Tata Power Company Ltd. gained 0.2 per cent to Rs 254.85 at 11:47AM (IST) in Monday's trade. The scrip has hit a high of Rs 256.8 and low of Rs 251.0 so far during the session. The… [+1356 chars]

articles.title: How IndiGo weathered the pandemic and joined a select global league of profit-making airlines - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The airline benefitted from factors such as higher utilisation, the opening up of tourism, festival and holiday travel, and a favourable change in policies.
articles.content:
IndiGo, Indias largest carrier by fleet size and domestic market share, joined global peers in financial recovery in the third quarter of FY22.
